Frame.Nav: Hydraulic components are easy to access behind main control valve panel. Ultra clean 1 micron filter.
Optional offset boom can be hydraulically moved right or left of center to allow parallel digging outside the tracks.
Design of the offset boom allows digging against the sides of buildings or around obstructions.
When A/C or heater/defroster isn't in use the sliding front upper glass can be stored overhead. Lower front glass can be removed & stored on the left side.
Hydraulically controlled dozer cuts 7ft. 7in. (2.32m) wide, 1ft. 4in. (.42m) lift above ground, 8in. (.21m) dig depth.

Arm digging force up to 8,857 lb (39.4 KN) on CX75 & 28,236 lb (125.6 kN) on CX225. Hydraulic system features swing brake, anti-drift valve, ultra clean filtering system, boom & arm cushioning & Art's drift valve, aux. control valve, power boost on CX225.
Adjustable 7-way suspension seat provides added comfort and enhances productivity. Other standard cab features include air/heat, AM/FM radio, sky light, sun visor, membrane switches, visibility.
Two-speed hydrostatic travel drive delivers up to 3.2 mph (5.1 Km/h) travel speed.
Available bucket sizes range from 0.24 yd3 (0.18 m3) on the CX75 to 1.53 yd3 (1.17 m3) on the CX225.
Easy-change air filter is accessed through side panel for quick and easy checks with no tools.
The compact design helps hold the swing radius to as little as 4 feet (1.21 m).
The cab features ample glass for maximum visibility.
Swing-out door provides quick access to hydraulic oil fill.
The engine is accessible under a flip-up hood for quick daily checks.
Fully enclosed, soundproofed cab has Isomount system that delivers comfortable operation and low-effort controls for maximum productivity.
Body design allows the excavator to swing within a single traffic lane or parrallel to the side of a building
